reviewText: I used to like watching the Amos Andy Show, before it went off the air.l
Remembered Amos and Andy when I was growing up and ordered this DVD, well it never worked.  I hate when you order something like this and it doesn't even play!
the copy of Amos and Andy was not Good at allWe could not enjoy the movie because the copy was so bad. I don't have 75 words to say abuo t this ,only that our copy of th movie is very bad.
I bought this as a Christmas gift for my brother.  We attempted to watch but the quality was so poor, we had to turn it off.

This DVD is terrible!  Extremely poor quality --- can hardly see it and the voices don't match the screen.  Also, there are many shows missing.
Don't buy this!!
I am returning this video. Cover said it contained 12 episodes and there were only 6. Also the quality of the video was awful.
